<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mummified Bat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=227)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are a master in Perception
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman is the magically treated corpse of a tiny bat bound in papyrus. When you activate the bat, the affixed weapon detects vibrations around you and guides your perception. You gain the benefits of the fighter [Blind-Fight](/Feats.aspx?ID=388) class feat for 1 minute.

 If you have the Blind-Fight feat, you gain imprecise echolocation with a range of 30 feet for 1 minute. This makes creatures that would be undetected by you because you can’t see them hidden instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
